article_title: Bill Clinton: Hillary has record of accomplishment

article_metadata.author: Ronnie Ellis/ rellis@cnhi.com

og.description: LEXINGTON — Former President Bill Clinton said his wife Hillary Clinton “is the best change agent I’ve ever known in my life” and has the experience to be a successful
